key_responsibilities: managing the front office, including answering, appropriately logging, and directing telephone calls
greeting visitors
monitoring office deliveries

other administrative duties
serving as the office tour coordinator
managing constituent requests for Capitol and White House tours
managing constituent requests for flags flown over the Capitol
requirements: motivated self-starters
highly organized
detail-oriented
able to multitask
exceptional interpersonal skills
ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
excellent “people skills”, displaying compassion in all interactions
strong commitment to providing outstanding constituent service
able to think on their feet
problem-solver
keen attention to detail
ability to multi-task
excellent oral and written skills
maintain a positive demeanor
demonstrate resilience in a busy environment

office: House Financial Services Committee Majority staff
position: Deputy Communications Director or Press Secretary
key_responsibilities: developing press releases
talking points and written materials
developing content for the Committee’s website and digital platforms
developing and maintaining relationships with national, local, political and minority-focused media
proactively pitching members of the press on Committee initiatives
requirements: creative
detail-oriented
strong media relations and writing skills
prior Capitol Hill or advocacy experience and knowledge of the legislative process
strong oral, writing and proofreading skills
positive approach to a busy and fast-paced work environment

key_responsibilities: representing the Member of Congress in the community
maintaining positive relationships with constituents, other local elected officials, and business and community leaders and organizations
handling constituent casework in their assigned issue areas, which includes answering casework correspondence
meeting with constituents
communicating with constituents
serving as a liaison with federal and local agencies
requirements: energetic
self-motivated
able to work quickly in a high pressure environment
able to meet very tight deadlines
exceptional writing and organizational skills
Fluent in Spanish

office: Active, hard-working Democratic member of Illinois congressional delegation
key_responsibilities: planning and implementing communications strategy across a broad portfolio
working closely with legislative and district staff to effectively communicate the Member’s message
handling daily media inquiries
maintaining relationships with national, Chicago, and local reporters
writing talking points and press releases
pitching op-eds
overseeing paid constituent outreach (franking) budget
managing website
producing videos and social media content
planning and promoting press events in DC and the district
requirements: previous communications and/or Capitol Hill experience
strong writing and oral communication skills
the ability to multitask and prioritize under pressure
team players with a good sense of humor
Spanish fluency

key_responsibilities: drafting statements, releases, social media copy, and advisories
staffing the Congresswoman, including taking pictures at community events and shooting direct-to-camera videos
designing graphics and editing videos
compiling daily press clips
maintaining reporter lists
requirements: highly motivated
detail-oriented
experience in digital media strategy, graphic design, and video editing

key_responsibilities: drafting legislation
writing hearing statements and legislative memos
preparing briefing materials

excellent writing, verbal and organizational skills
ability to be a self-starter while working in a fast-paced environment
